title: Tipo | 4 Font Releases | Botija, Lineare, Malena and Titulata
content:
Submitted by [fontime](http://web.archive.org/web/20110916155340/http:/typophile.com/user/1501 "View user profile.") : 30.May.2007 4.53pm 

We are glad to present our first 4 fonts families at Tipo. Latin American type foundry with an ambitious objective: to supply digital types of high quality to everybody.  
 [
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110916155340im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tipo_4fonts_5588.jpg)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20110916155340/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/)  
Estamos felices de anunciarles el lanzamiento de las primeras 4 familias tipogr√°ficas de Tipo, fundidora latinoamericana, que tiene un ambicioso objetivo: surtir de tipos digitales de alta calidad a todo el mundo.

More Information:  
 [www.tipo.net.ar](http://web.archive.org/web/20110916155340/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/ "www.tipo.net.ar")
author: fontime
